title: $:/plugins/dyp/contextmenu-highlight&bookmark
author: dyp
name: contextmenu-highlight&bookmark
description: 右键增强菜单-高亮和书签等
readme:
; 右键增强菜单-高亮和书签等

本插件修改自以下两个插件：

context-menu-plugin

https://context-menu-plugin.tiddlyhost.com/

Context menu selection add-in

https://fastfreddy.gitlab.io/context-menu-selection-add-in/

书签功能需要安装两个依赖插件 [[条目内滚动翻页|$:/plugins/dyp/tiddler-scrollpage]] 和 [[条目内可跳转书签|$:/plugins/dyp/bookmark]]
